descriptions: ['DescriptionStep inside this 5 bedroomed Terranova family home and you feel like you are in a showhouse.\xa0 Owner occupied from handover, immaculately presented and lovingly renovated throughout.\xa0 The large open plan lounge/dining room leads through to the garden and features Bi-Fold doors allowing an inside/outside living concept.\xa0 The completely renovated kitchen with integrated appliances flows through to a family lounge which features Bi-Fold doors to the garden. On the ground floor there is a a guest suite, maids room, utility area and powder room.\xa0 The first floor consists of a large landing area, perfect as a study or lounge and 4 generously sized bedrooms, the master bedroom has a beautiful walk-in-wardrobe and stunning Bagno Design bathroom. One of the bedrooms has an en-suite and the other 2 share a bathroom.\xa0 All of the bathrooms are completed with contemporary Bagno Finishings. The well established garden feature a\xa0 temperature controlled swimming pool, outdoor kitchen, dining area and ample place to play. This is a stunning property and needs to be viewed to appreciated.Permit no.0081061462']

Located on Mohammed Bin Rashid Boulevard, a bustling thoroughfare lined with retail outlets and vibrant cafes, the twin Standpoint towers are situated in close proximity to Burj Khalifa, the world’s tallest building.
Standpoint provides residents easy access to the varied lifestyle offerings in Downtown Dubai, including The Dubai Mall and Souk Al Bahar, as well as the world-class hotels in the 500-acre neighbourhoods.
Standpoint residences serve as ideal homes for trendsetters and professionals, who value living in one of the most dynamic destinations in the city.']
